abstract: Rafael Nadal defeats two-time defending champion Kei Nishikori at Barcelona Open, matching Guillermo Vilas's record of winning 49 career clay-court championships; other tennis news noted.
snippet: Rafael Nadal of Spain beat Kei Nishikori of Japan to win the Barcelona Open for the ninth time, equaling Guillermo Vilas’s record of 49 career clay-court championships.
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal of Spain beat Kei Nishikori of Japan to win the Barcelona Open for the ninth time, equaling Guillermo Vilas’s record of 49 career clay-court championships.
